sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormArray, FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-expense', templateUrl: './add-expense.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-expense.component.css'] }) export class AddExpenseComponent implements OnInit { expenseForm!:any usersInGroup!:any ngOnInit(): void { this.expenseForm=new FormGroup({ expenseName:new FormControl(null), expenseDescription:new FormControl(null), expenseAmount:new FormControl(null), paidBy:new FormArray([]) }) } onAdd(){ const emailControl=new FormControl(null); (this.expenseForm.controls['paidBy'] as FormArray).push(emailControl); } onSubmit(){ console.log(this.expenseForm); } }
